entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C

Observed at: North East Margaree 2:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
